attributes.action: Request intervention by the United Nations in Zimbabwe following the election of March 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the election of March 2008 the results have not been released and the government of Robert Mugabe and Zanu PF have initiated a war of terror on the people of Zimbabwe to attempt to continue the rule of Mugabe and Zanu PF, inspite of a majority voting for MDC.  United Nations intervention is needed to prevent further humanitarian crisis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
